page.title: 05 Soap Operas On T. V.
page.content: Soap operas are some peoples enjoyment , yet some peoples non enjoyment . Some peopleturn them off the T.V saying they don'tseem anything likepeoples way of living but most enjoy and live on them . Most soap operas are from America , like Dallas and Dynasty , but there are some from Britain like Coranation Street and the latest one East Enders . The T.V programes are about a family or something and are acted out by acters . They show happenings of things that may happen in our life . Because it is on T.V it has to be exciting , thats why some people turn them off saying its not true to life , but whats the point in makingthem so exciting ? When soap operas are shown on T.V it sometimes shows on little kids , but it shos enjoyment to some people like me J. Chamberlain Aged 11 Yrs.
